title: Bug 42724 - StyledText selection rendered incorrectly on bidi platforms
description: When using StyledText on bidi platforms, the selection rendering appears to be incorrect. I believe that we can optimize the rendering process by modifying the code in StyledTextRenderer.drawLine. It should no longer be necessary to redraw the entire selection background, and instead, a style range for the selection should be created in the drawLine method.
OB: The selection rendering on bidi platforms is currently incorrect.
EB: The drawLineSelectionBackground function should only be used to render the special line break selection.
SR:
To reproduce the issue on a bidi platform, follow these steps:
1. Open an application that uses StyledText on a bidi platform.
2. Select some text within the StyledText component.
3. Observe the incorrect rendering of the text selection.
